name: Island Run!
description:
Play as Alex, an explorer who was left stranded on an island in the Pacific. Can you guide them across the beach, avoiding zombies and wild birds, and escape from the island? Or will Alex perish, and spend the rest of their life doomed on the sands of this deadly island?

This is an Atari 2600 game developed for the Exotic/Old System Jam. You will need an Atari 2600 emulator to run this game (I recommend Stella https://stella-emu.github.io/index.html).

To control Alex, press up to jump and avoid enemies. If you die, the game can be reset by pressing the fire button.
